bug.author: AaronBitman
bug.description:
I tried to install ciphey with pip. I got: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement cipheycore(0.3.0,)=0.2.8 (from ciphey) (from versions: ) No matching distribution found for cipheycore(0.3.0,)=0.2.8 (from ciphey) Versions:
Windows 7 Professional version 6.1 (Build 7601: Service Pack 1) Python version: 3.7.4 pip version: First 19.0.3, and when that failed, 20.2.2
